title: About CNPJfy
subtitle: Free Brazilian business data lookup
description: CNPJfy is an open-source platform that provides public data from the Brazilian Federal Revenue in a free and accessible way. Our mission is to democratize access to business information in Brazil.

features.title: Features
features.realTimeDataDesc: Always updated information from Federal Revenue

technology.title: Technology
technology.description: Built with the most modern web technologies to ensure performance and accessibility.

contribute.title: How to contribute
contribute.description: CNPJfy is a community project. Your contribution is very welcome!

license.title: License
license.description: This project is licensed under the MIT license. You can use, modify and distribute freely.

credits.title: Credits
credits.receita: Data provided by Brazilian Federal Revenue
